Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI also tends to consider the whole document/assignment whereas when it comes to teachers whilst they have a deeper and more knowledgably in marking they can tend to gloss over or not consider the whole assignment and instead just focus on things that stood out for better or for worse

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: teachers tend to provide long winded and difficult to understand feedback, usually failing to get to the point and provide a clear explanation in terms of feedback, whereas with AI you are able to ask it questions about the feedback in a more direct way which makes me feel less frustrated as i am able to understand more easily for example, "why I got something wrong"

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI can sometimes give a very general response
